articles.title: "Facebook rapist" who escaped prison by faking death with help from guards is brought back to South Africa - CBS News
articles.description: Heavily-armed police put his girlfriend, celebrity doctor Nandipha Magudumana, into a separate white van at the airport.
articles.content: A man serving a life sentence for murder and rape who escaped from a top-security prison with help from guards by faking his own burning death was brought back to South Africa early Thursday after go… [+5426 chars]
